website_summaries.verdict: Dead Island serves up some choice zombie-thrashing thrills in a gorgeous environment, but a weak story, tedious fetch quests, pacing issues, and some multiplayer issues keep it from greatness.
cons: Multiplayer combat isnâ€™t as smooth as single player

customer_reviews.title: Activation key is duplicate!
customer_reviews.text: The activation key was a duplicate on Steam. Which from what i understand was previously sold to someone else. The product support on the company's website is non existant. Easy scam to fall into, like I did unfortunately. Ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great game.
customer_reviews.text: It's an overall great game, but the crafting part of the game could be better if you ask me, and I find it to be odd that a crowbar loose durability when you hit zombies with it, last I checked those are made of pure metal and should last for a ton of hits before you would need to repair it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing gameplay, however becomes easy after you get to know all zombies. Should have improved on AI a little
customer_reviews.author: P. Kunstar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great item, great delivery, item as described, great price, happy all round.
customer_reviews.author: gt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of my best games ever.I played 6 times to the end.
customer_reviews.author: C. Rieg

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Fun
customer_reviews.text: The game is ok, since you can play online however it gets a bit repetitive and boring, just killing zombies. Vehicles are great fun, especially multiplayer. To be honest I would buy a different game, its slightly too boring for my taste.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: game didnt work as activation code had already been used ...
customer_reviews.text: game didnt work as activation code had already been used. very dissapointing as it was a birthday present . had to return and get a refund
customer_reviews.author: kelly hatton

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun
customer_reviews.text: A bit gorey but an excellent challenge, I like being able to drive around the game area and then follw the story when you want too.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Read

customer_reviews.title: duplicate product key - game will not load
customer_reviews.text: can not review game as it will not load due to duplicate product key... do not know if sold a returned game or if there is a game issue, would recommend shop else where.
customer_reviews.author: paul hassall

customer_reviews.title: Product key.
customer_reviews.text: I can Not recomend this game. Because the product key did not work, Because it had already had being used.
customer_reviews.author: stephen patterson

customer_reviews.title: dead island review
customer_reviews.text: still alot of bugs in the game you can hit zombies through walls and doors and sometimes you just sink in the ground
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: WARNING
customer_reviews.text: This is a good game, fun to play on co-op with friends much more so than on your own. A word of warning, however; Every copy of this game I have bought (for me and friends and all from different on-line sellers) has responded with a CD-Key already in use. Sellers will just reply saying to contact the manufacturer, and Steam support is too painfully slow to deal with. So I 100% recommend you but this game directly through steam if you do not wish to have any problems! (its the summer sale anyway!)
customer_reviews.author: Lobbo

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Product
customer_reviews.text: The product that was sold to me was faulty, the activation code was used, so I could not register the game on Steam. My friend also purchased this game with the same problem, we are both upset by this and will not be purchasing another copy from the same dealer.
customer_reviews.author: K.Mason

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work at all, was advised that the online ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work at all, was advised that the online content would't work, but as its a steam game, I couldn't register it or finish installing. I would avoid at all costs.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Greene

customer_reviews.title: FUN FUN FUN
customer_reviews.text: Dead island is one of the funnest games I've played in years. The length is highly satisfactory a good 20+ hours with doing around half the non-story quests. My flatmate has around 30+ hours with all quests complete. It's one of those games you can definatly play through over and over as you get the New Game+ option where you keep all items and upgrades. The exp system is done well as the upgrades really make the game more enjoyable and upgrading weapons adds lots of cool effects. Blunt Weapons + Tesla Mod == FUN FUN FUN
customer_reviews.author: Big Hugs

customer_reviews.title: Dead good
customer_reviews.text: Been playing for a while now like beating the crap out of the zombies about 50% done, left for dead is a better game more guns etc but i like the quests with this, although I do get annoyed when I make a molotof or bomb if I try to put to inventory it ends up being thrown, the zobies level up as you do and it does get harder so you have to adapt, I like making the weapons, gave it 3 stars overal as some niggles,
customer_reviews.author: Mr. R. J. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly and in perfect order
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my dad, he has been wanting this for a long time so I thought why not, I was very happy to have recived the product quickly and before it was meant to be here and not damaged I was very plased and so was my dad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A weak Diablo in First Person on an beautiful Island
customer_reviews.text: - 4 different Charakters - a wohle bunch of weapons (+ weapons class like - good-exeptional-rare-epic) - weapon uprgades a lot) - 4 player coop at "ANY TIME IN THE GAME AND WHEN YOU LIKE ALSO UNKNOWN PLAYERS, in SP!!!!" - Graphics are up to date...not bad but Whooo...but all in all good - more like a real Zombie Outbreak then LFD1+2 and Dead Rising...firearms are useless, realistic gameplay is palpable! - And so on ...buy this game for a +/- 20/Pounds and its ok... Just a few neg things... it had lags during mp and it wasnt so stable... All in all a great Game!!! Buy it and love it...i did and do :)
customer_reviews.author: Helvete-Ger

customer_reviews.title: "Game key in use."
customer_reviews.text: Don't even bother until they sort this out. Trying to install through Steam results in Steam claiming the product key is invalid and the only way you can play is if you email off your proof of purchase to Steam. And even then, they'll treat YOU like the criminal. Judging by the other reviews, I'm not the only one this has happened to and will, no doubt, not be the last. Sort it out.
customer_reviews.author: Lainey

customer_reviews.title: Dead Island
customer_reviews.text: brilliant game, definately worth more than i paid for. solo player is endless as the zombies level up as you level up. sadly, for online play whenever i join, other people disconnect ( apart from 1, and we played for 6 hours straight ) . if you like survival horror games, and love an open world enviromemt, then you can definately not got wrong with this
customer_reviews.author: Taosd

customer_reviews.title: Good fun!
customer_reviews.text: Good game! Better then Left4Dead. Great on line game experience! Fantastic maps. Really worthy to buy! My recommendation! Have fun!! For all zombie shooter lovers!!
customer_reviews.author: dalko

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing product experience
customer_reviews.text: Did not have a good experience with actual product (delivery fine). Product key had been hacked and already in use before packaging had been opened. As a result, lengthy process to prove purchase before able to play. All up took a week to fix. Game experience average - did not finish.
customer_reviews.author: sjt

customer_reviews.title: Farcry meets Resident Evil meets World Of Warcraft
customer_reviews.text: I love the originality of this game. Was a bit sceptic about another zombie whacker but a friend of mine told me Dead Island was well worth the money so I took the plunge and bought it. The graphics are gorgeous and it's really fun to play, going around the island completing missions whilst sticking to a story line. The co-op mode means you can go through the game with your friends too so you dont have to do it all alone. One of the best games this year in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: DEAD ISLAND (PC DVD)
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS A ZOMBIE GAME A PRESENT FOR MY HUBBY. REALISTIC ZOMBIES. PLENTY OF ITEMS TO KILL THEM WITH.IT IS NOT JUST A ZOMBIE GAME BUT THERE ARE ITEMS THAT YOU CAN USE TO KILL THE ZOMBIES WITH.
customer_reviews.author: MAGGIE

customer_reviews.title: Unashamed plagiarism
customer_reviews.text: Title says it all, take a big dollop of Left 4 dead, a spoonful of Fallout and a sprinkle of Killing floor and there you have it! The perfect recipe for an Ok zombie bashing game if somewhat buggy and unfinished. Oh well, as long as we keep buying them, they'll keep making them... 5/10.
customer_reviews.author: S. MERMIER

customer_reviews.title: Crashes
customer_reviews.text: This game looks promising, but crashes every thity seconds or so for me. i7 quad and 2x Gtx 285 in SLI,(still crashes when disabled), and plenty of memory. Reminds me of The Witcher 2 crash experience before patching. Think I will cease P.C. gaming when the new consoles come out, starting to get the impression that these companies wouldn't be too much bothered. Game over for P.C.games, I've had enough of products not fit for purpose. Avoid until you get good evidence of decent patching.
customer_reviews.author: Largactil Hat

customer_reviews.title: buggy
customer_reviews.text: I would've given it a better review, but I'm afraid it's just too buggy. After 10-15 minutes of play, flickering dots appear all over the screen, the sound loops over and over and it totally crashes the PC. After which it's a 'switch the PC off at the wall' job - this has happened three times now. It's a shame because it showed signs of being quite amusing.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Stoppable

customer_reviews.title: Such a good game!
customer_reviews.text: I find this game to be fantastic, whether your playing this game by yourself or not, It is truly amazing and I would recommend it to anyone who enjoys slicing and bashing the undead.
customer_reviews.author: Ty Segura

customer_reviews.title: steam software
customer_reviews.text: hiya pc users this is a good game but one problem all games these days are run with software call steam before you buy you will need a online connetion to activation key for the game steam it is abit of con because the game licence only have 1 user so therefore you buy the game that your licence to play in stream you can't play the game til you activation game online.
customer_reviews.author: matthew murphy

customer_reviews.title: One hell of a game
customer_reviews.text: I received it as quickly as promised and was surprised by the fun the game does. It is quiet addictive...
customer_reviews.author: indio

product_meta.title: Dead Island (PC DVD)
product_meta.description:
Platform:PCMANUFACTURER'S DESCRIPTION


If you've been dreaming about paradise, we know a place where you can make those dreams come true--the Island of Banoi. Just off the coast of Papua New Guinea, located south of the Equator and just north of Australia.



The Island of Banoi Dead Island combines first-person action with a heavy focus on melee combat 
Hordes of different festering zombies await players around every cornerDead Island is inspired by classic zombie movies
A PARADISE TO DIE FOR
Until very recently much of the island was wild and primitive and totally untouched by the modern world. Even though the capital, Moresby, was founded by Australian settlers in 1895, many places deep in the interior still have never been seen by western eyes.

As a guest of the Royal Palms Resort, the player's stay was supposed to be a dream holiday; a luxurious getaway to the beautiful beaches of a tropical paradise. But faced with the reality of a zombie apocalypse, there is only one thing left to do: Survive.

This is Dead Island... a paradise to die for.

TERROR. VIOLENCE. MADNESS.
Terror. Violence. Madness. Bedlam. A holiday paradise gone mad. A tropical island turns into total chaos after a mysterious zombie outbreak. Cut off from the rest of the world, the player’s only chance to survive is to fight to the death and find a way to escape from the island.

Dead Island combines first-person action with a heavy focus on melee combat, character development and customisation of a vast array of weapons. All of these gameplay features are presented in a dark story inspired by classic zombie movies with a gritty and engrossing campaign that can be played with up to four players in co-op mode.

Set in an open world tropical island, hordes of different festering zombies await players around every corner while they embark on a variety of thrilling missions through the holiday resort. With firearms and ammunition being scarce the player must rely on utilising found items as weapons for self-defence and fight off zombie hordes in intense melee combat. A diverse range of items can be collected and will later serve to transform the player’s ordinary makeshift weapons into serious instruments of destruction.

In addition to satisfying even the most bloodthirsty action fan’s fantasy, Dead Island also features role-playing elements which allow the player to develop one of the game’s unique character classes according to their preferences, all the while learning new skills and fresh tactics during their journey through the perilous environments of the island. What’s more, anytime during a game up to four players can seamlessly join together and experience the intense combat and immersive story with cooperative gameplay.

With the all-new Chrome Engine 5 powering Dead Island, the game will use the latest installment of Techland’s acclaimed proprietary game engine, allowing the player to experience the tropical island paradise in graphical splendour with diverse environments like lush forests and detailed city environments.
feature_bullets: Set on an gorgeous open world tropical island
